summary: John Deakin is being transported, as a prisoner, on a train with supplies and medicine to Fort Humboldt, Nevada.
cast: Charles Bronson|Ben Johnson|Richard Crenna|Jill Ireland|Charles Durning|Ed Lauter|Bill McKinney|David Huddleston|Roy Jenson|Rayford Barnes|Scott Newman|Robert Tessier|Joe Kapp|Archie Moore|Sally Kirkland|Sally Kemp|Eddie Little Sky|Keith McConnell|John Mitchum|Read Morgan|Robert Rothwell|Casey Tibbs|Doug Atkins|Eldon Burke|Irv Faling|Paul Frees|William Klein|Ron Ponozzo
title: Nevada Express
